content:
Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 19}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 14, "index": 22}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 28}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft polished_diorite, I need to place 4 diorites in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one diorite from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 19}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 14, "index": 22}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 28}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I'll move another diorite from slot 42 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 19}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 14, "index": 22}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 28}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I'll move another diorite from slot 42 to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 19}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 14, "index": 22}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 28}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I'll move the last diorite from slot 42 to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4. This completes the 2x2 square, and I can now craft the polished_diorite.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 45, "index": 19}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 14, "index": 22}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 28}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the polished_diorite has been crafted, I'll move it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
